description: Try our easy to follow Apple & Blueberry Jelly Treats recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jelly,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Soy free,Wheat free,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Apple & Blueberry Jelly Treats Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk gelatine with 1/2 cup of water in a small bowl. Heat juice in a pan until simmering. Remove from heat, whisk into gelatine mixture until completely dissolved. Pour into a 20cm cake pan. Cool for 30 minutes, then refrigerate for 20 minutes until partially set.
Push blueberries into jelly and refrigerate for at least 3 hours or until set. Turn out and cut into squares. Place into small containers, and keep chilled (see tip).
